General.Name: AIML Resources Inc
General.Description: Firebird Resources Inc., an exploration stage company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties in the United States. The company primarily explores for gold deposits. Its flagship projects include the Buzzard project covering an area of 68 acres located in Lancaster County, South Carolina; and Belk project located to the east of Lancaster, South Carolina. The company was formerly known as Falcon Ventures International Inc. and changed its name to Firebird Resources Inc. in November 2009. Firebird Resources Inc. is headquartered in Edmonton, Canada.
